content: @Ted Klein: CodeSystem-v3-brazilianProcedureCodesSUS.json has URL https://fhir.infoway-inforoute.ca/CodeSystem/scpqual
and why is there no value set http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActCode ?
Also:

Unresolved value set reference: http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-2.7-0360
Unresolved value set reference: http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActReason
and http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ConfidentialityClassification
this is the full v3 list:

http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActCode
http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActReason
http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActStatus
http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-OrganizationIndustryClass
http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-RoleCode

http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActCode: http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActCode/v3-ActCode.xml
http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActReason: http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActReason/v3-ActReason.xml
http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-OrganizationIndustryClass: http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/OrganizationIndustryClass/v3-OrganizationIndustryClass.xml
http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-RoleCode: http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/RoleCode/v3-RoleCode.xml
@Ted Klein code systems that define codes but do not specify case senstivity:

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/triggerEventID
http://www.ada.org/snodent
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/hl7TermMaintInfra
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/HCPCS
the code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/conceptdomainsdefines an illegal code Masterfile Action Code - no spaces allowed in HL7 defined codes
Crap. This was published as the name of the concept domain for almost 20 years, I'll change the code. Sigh.
I don't get the extension related error. Don't know why we're different
Ugh. The hardest kind of problem to solve. Ping me in your morning I'll plan to work late tonight and we will figure it out.
well, have you committed the latest you have? and can you upgrade to 1.1.13 and test that
just finishing the last of them - note that you pasted the wrong link for v3 organizationIndustryClass gives a 404 error
only can access the html, not the xml file
if you give me that xml file I'll add it to the ones I an about to commit after a validation build and you'll have them all

I don't know where I ran into the reference to v3-OrganizationIndustryClass - it doesn't seem to be valid whatever
ok then, I'll commit the rest now. just ran a build with 1.1.13 and I'll be dipped in dipsy-doodles: error count went from 1449 to 0!
